Q_DESC:
An ice-cream stall sells both green tea and mocha ice cream. A small portion of either costs $0.75 and a large portion costs $1.25. During a short period of time, the number of ice creams sold is taken as a matrix(2*2) which contains the no of small and large portions of both flavours.

Find out the sales of the green tea and mocha flavour.

Input:First and Second line contains the small and large portion of green tea.
Third and Fourth line contains the small and large portion of mocha.
Fifth and sixth line contains the price of small and large portion respectively
